132222211112.content:
After brushing nonstop with the immense hair strand, you felt ready to break apart.

The familiar voice boomed above, like a declaration from the heavens: "...And so, 178212 + 184112 = 192212... If, like, you ignore a whole bunch of digits at the end, who probably weren't pulling their weight to begin with. Wait... Hold up, was this literature class, or science class? We were talking about how hard it is for plants to photosynthesize smoothies, frappes, and lattes, and then, like -"

Somewhere along the line - either minutes or hours in, you lost track of time - it reached time for your home-schooling. December decided to just start teaching in the middle of your work. For the sake of sanity, you had long relegated the titanic teacher's lessons to a background ambiance. It was just a part of the atmosphere, along with the rumbling every time she flexed a toe, or the swooshing of her hair and fingers through the skies above.

Trying to follow her logic provided very little comfort or distraction from the agony surging through your body. But it was done now. Entire stadiums of red polish - endless, unbroken polish - lay below you, behind you, all around you... And that was just on the tip of December's smallest toenail.

Over the horizon, her other toes rested in order, like a great mountain chain made from the curves of her dermis and keratin. The ceiling light gave them a warm, lambent sheen.

This was the fruit of your labors. Nearly breaking your back moving up and down each digit... Getting aches all over... Staining yourself with the crimson liquid several times... Getting caught in the place where the nails met her skin, which was like an immense canyon... Knocked across by her fidgets and itches... Once, falling off one of the "mountains" as her foot sweat built up - only saving yourself by grabbing a minuscule wrinkle between her toes... Occasionally having her blow on her nails to dry them, only to send you flying...

All this labor, a quest across gigantic landscapes, and this was the result: your older sister's nail polish looked MARGINALLY nicer than if she did it herself. The difference was hard to see even at your stature. It'd probably last for a few days before needing a new coat.

Still, you had to congratulate yourself for a job well done.

The nails' owner finished the lesson off thusly: "...And that's why this Socrates guy was the first late-night comedy show host. His trial was the original celebrity court scandal!" The planetoid-like face above leaned in closer, the speed of her movement sending you off-guard. Even her blinking created great winds, the lashes making a harsh noise as each follicle brushed together. "Oh, wow!" Her hands jumped to her mouth. "Wowwowow, this looks sooooo nice!"

December reached her hands over, each line in the palm large enough to consume you. A sickening shake knocked you over. She grabbed under her arches, and wiggled each gigantic toe in childish delight. You were swung back and forth, losing your sense of perspective. She actually twisted the foot you were on around some times, just to better examine your flawless work. Not only did the stadium of nail you were on shake like crazy; in the distance, the mountainous other toes stretched in and out, flexing with the greatest of ease, as if the world itself was changing shapes at December's whim. When she brought the other foot up, the dirt specks coating her sole were even bigger than you.

She slammed both feet to the floor, with the force of meteors. Fortunately, your hold on her was strong. Not to mention, the polish was sticky, and easy to hold onto. It still winded you, but you weren't hurt at all. There was the positive. That, and your sister's earnest smile. She lifted the layered magnifying glasses to spot you. Her gigantic lips spread out, her eyes lit up - colossal, but with no traces of mockery or judgement.

Total carelessness, maybe. Dangerous lack of regard, sure. But no malice.

"Thank you! I love them."

She gave the most gigantic thumbs-up you'd ever seen in your life. You couldn't do much but give it back. Knowing your voice would be too faint, you signed: "Did you expect any less?"

The young woman laughed, her voice ringing out from every direction. "Yeah! I kinda thought you'd mess up my nails and give up!"

At this, you couldn't help but wonder: "Why did you want me to paint them, then? Just so you'd have an excuse to get mad at me?"

She put her finger up, making a whizzing noise through the air. "Ah, you caught me! This was part of your secret education."

You gazed over the expanse of a face for a moment, puzzled. Your sister beamed with pride, just like when she discovered how to operate the toaster.

She said, "Moving your arms in circles like that builds up strength and good posture. So you've been training this whole time you were painting! I got the idea from a movie. It was all, 'wax on, wax off' and I thought - yeah, that could work!"

She smiled brighter, bearing her pearly teeth, as if expecting you to congratulate and thank her. The red polish on your body felt heavy and wet.

"...So," you started signing after a silence, "Mr. Miyagi gave you the idea to make me paint your toenails."

She nodded, the wind pressure from her blonde locks nearly blowing you off the toenail platform.

You continued: "And you expect me to... learn karate from this."

Another booming nod.

Almost worried, you asked: "Who am I supposed to fight with using karate at this size?"

The giant smile shrunk. Her "thinking" face came on to replace it - finger under her lip, gazing to the side blankly. Even when it was wider than twenty stadiums, you could recognize it. You could practically smell smoke as the wheels in her head turned to decipher her own logic. A look of panic struck her face as she grabbed her hair, pulling it as if it would make her brain go faster. "Uh, it's... Not about fighting or winning. It's... er..." Her face twisted sideways, before pointing to the distant ceiling. "About finding inner peace... and inner strength... and, uh, balance. Yes." She moved to a solemn expression, eyes shut in reverence. "Very spiritual stuff. Philosophical. You will learn in time, small padawan."

Well. That explained everything. She didn't mean any harm, so you tried to laugh it off. But after all the effort it took to get just to this point, you were just exhausted.

"Whatever, though! They look nice, that's what matters. I'll go out in sandals and tell everyone how great you are at painting. Ooh, maybe we can rent you out as a polisher!" She got up, taking a step forward - it felt like the whole world rose and fell, carrying you with it.

December stopped with one foot forward. "Whoops, forgot to take you off!"

She leaned over with a toothpick, the size of a tree trunk to you. It lodged between her index and thumb, and you were able to see the minuscule print it made on her skin as she moved it down. She placed it close enough for you to grab on to. That is, it would be close enough, if you could move your arms.
You squirmed, and forced with all muscles in your minuscule arms and legs. You wouldn't budge. Between gusts of wind from lectures and chats, and the movement of her hair, along with your attempts to move in closer during the gigantic steps, the nail polish around your body had dried. It merged with the rest of the nail's evenly-spread coat. You were trapped in the middle of your older sister's field of toenail polish.

Everything felt cold, even with the body heat around you. If only you had half-assed this... Or been more attentive of the stuff on your body...

She wagged the giant baton before your face impatiently. "Hey, come on, bro! I'm holding it close enough, what's up?" The ease with which she manipulated the rod was terrifying - it took only the tiniest twitch of her wrist for the whole pillar before you to fly around. Even a simple flick could snap this mighty trunk in two splinters.

You shouted: "I'm stuck here!", knowing she couldn't hear. Your neck couldn't move, forcing your gaze up to the looming face and miles of legs above.

The face looked puzzled for a second, before realizing what it meant. "Oooh. Stuck. That's bad!" She put on the thinking face again, tapping her foot. "I know. I've got some nail polish remover. Don't move!"

The request was easy enough to follow. Even with each horrific rise-and-fall motion from the steps, you had no way of resisting. All you could do was try to keep a positive mindset.

She opened a dresser, but paused. "Waitaminnut. I threw it all out when it dropped on my magazines and law school application." She twitched, shaking you. "Awww, I really really want to get out and show your work off, though! And if I scratch too hard, I'll ruin it all!" She looked to you, and shouted (some decibels too loudly): "What do I do? This is my most complex dilemma since Rouge's birthday in sixth grade!"

Recovering, you could only shrug - or attempt to, still stuck hard to her nail. Did she even know you were unable to answer?
132222211112.title: The Perfect Pedicure?

1322222111121.content:
December scratched at her blonde locks, miles and miles in the air, each thicker than your torso. Together, they became a golden sea of dread and confusion, their swishing like mighty sonic booms. "Come on, help me! Give me a sign!"

If your arm wasn't glued hard by even layers of nail polish, you can think of a few signs you'd give your planetoid sister. You wish you didn't wake up on this March morning - stirred from your box room and thread bed by her face and tweezers. How could you predict you'd be stranded on this ditz's stadium-sized little toe?

Her mountainous digits drummed the sandal's surface in thought. This mere fidget sent you rocketing to the sky, and crashing down with meteor force. The pressure would send you flying, were it not for the rock-hard paint keeping you lodged in place.

"I should get you out, bro..." Her voice alone made your body bounce within its keratin confines. "...But I can't ruin your masterpiece! You poured your eensy-weensy heart into this job!"

She honestly appeared choked up about this. Her throat bulged. You groaned, knowing she couldn't hear: "Only because you told me to..."

You lifted again, higher to the ceiling sites. Your sister paced in circles, scratching her head harder. Your heart stopped with every STOMP - large enough to crush a city beneath it, and powerful enough to crack the planet's core. Even the slap of her sandals against her heels was terrifyingly loud. "And I told you to paint them... this is the labor of siblings' love! The expert stroke of your tiny hands! My feet as the canvas, my hair as the brush, and my brains as the guide!" She lifted the foot up by the sole, giving you a panorama view of her glowing, bulbous eyes. "I'd be a bully if I messed that up!"

You quivered at the blink of her eyes - the lashes were windy forests that you could lose yourself in. "But you had no problem bullying me into doing your nails... Or polishing you jewels..."

"Buuut, then agaaain..." Without warning, the goliath slammed down and shuffled, now rattling your innards side to side. "It'd be nice for you to do other chores!... Uhm, uh, I mean... Nice for you to learn more thingamajigs through experience!" She clapped. "I'm sure I can save you without scratching my nail! Alright, the Brother Rescue Operation is in effect!"

At this declaration, she put her hands to her forehead, rubbing hard for a good idea to pop out. You took this rare moment of stillness to test, basking in the magnified scenery. It didn't matter of it was for her own self-interest, or that you had more banal tasks in the future. You'd been so shaken by her mountain-moving fighting; so puzzled following December's train of thought on its rickety rails; and gotten so tired of seeing foothills in each direction. Anything that'd free you from this titanic idiot's shadow would be worth it.

Your humongous sister pulled her ankle from the sandal - the landscape of worn rubber with the skyscraper strap flying out of view. You ascended, as if on a rocket ship - looking at landscapes of leg, shirt, and face pass by. She held her small toe to her lips, giving you a close-up perspective of its intricate, wet folds. Soon, they parted, and her deafening boom echoed: "First attempt! I'll blow you out!"

You barely recovered from the attack on your ears, when she puckered her massive mouth, and began puffing. Tropical storms couldn't compare to the power of this girl's breath. The heavy, humid winds flapped your shirt and hair so much, it was as if they'd fly right off into the air. Microscopic globs of spittle doused your teensy face, and the crimson fields around you; but the continual hurricane instantly dried them off. Her lungs wouldn't give out, barraging you with a force more powerful than a locomotive.

You quietly promised to never again say she was "full of hot air". It might tempt fate.

When Hurricane December quieted, you panted heavily. Your hair went puffy. Moving your head, trying to straighten it, you found your neck stuck even firmer!

"Waaait... Hah..." your would-be liberator thought, panting herself. "Blowing on things... hah... just dries them up, right? Aw, shoot!" Your sister punched herself in the forehead. Standing only on one heel, it made her lose balance, and tumble over - and you came crashing down with her. You shook in a cacophony of sound and motion as her backside hit the floor.

If you had a free hand, you would facepalm. "You idiot..."

"Well, long as we're here - second attempt! I'll wiggle you off!" She declared.

Your heart sunk.

Her unbelievably large fingers descended upon the digit, grabbing the phalange on both sides. The skin folded back to accommodate the monumental tips. And soon, she shook it. "This little piggy went to... uh, where was it?"

Upwards, and downwards - you rocketed to the heavens, and descended to Hades, in one split second. The platform of polish flew haphazardly, jolting you in new directions without a modicum of effort. The room was a shapeless blur. Heck, your joints felt as if they were losing shape, lost in the inertia of ascent, re-entry, and centrifuge all at once.

And worse - when it ended, you STILL couldn't budge a micrometer! "It's not working..."

December squinted intently at you through magnifying glasses, groaning. "Didn't want to do this, but here comes Plan C. Rubbing you out!"

You already hated Plan C.

The smallest toe on her other foot - beautified by your labors - descended on top of the other, and started brushing the nail. Hills and valleys of your sister's supple skin smothered you, sliding on your diminished form again and again. No matter where you looked, there was a whole sky of rolling flesh.

Faster she rubbed, filling your senses with her flesh. She drove you deep into the joint, sending you hurdling over vistas of detritus. You shut your eyes to prevent the salty surfaces from stinging; but that did little to help the incredible friction racing across you from scalp to shoes and back to your scalp.

By the frustrated "Hnnng" above, it was clear December wasn't having much fun, either. "No good! I'll have to try harder!"

Now, the ditz put her sole into it. Her entire sole, stretching out miles - you didn't know how many. It was impossible to see the monster in its entirety, from thundering heel to wiggling toes. Still, you felt every inch of the surface, bit by bit, as she dragged her nail across it. Vigorous pressure beat on you from every side. The keratin slid and kneaded the flesh, flakes of it flying off. It was like a small country had decided to rise from the sea and give you a full-body massage.

She ground, squeezed, and rubbed, quicker, harder, deeper. Eventually, her ankle became sore, and her skin turned raw. You'd thoroughly explored every detail of your big sister's wrinkles - and they had thoroughly explored you. Nothing. The two of you were hopelessly glued together, sweltering from the effort.

December put on her intense "thinking" face anew. "Urgh. What if I have to keep you on here for a days? How would you poop or shower?" Her forehead creased. "How would -I- poop or shower? There's gotta be another way. Maybe if we have spare pills, we could shrink shrink you small enough to wiggle out..."

She wanted to shrink you MORE?A vision passed in your head. You, trekking endless mountains of a continent-sized toenail; fending off bacteria; listening to an omnipotent voice booming a lesson about the famous scientist Alfred "Al" Gebra...

You screamed, and thrashed an arm in panic.

The red polish didn't hold it back.

One of your limbs had just escaped.

"Huh?" December peered to your free arm, the magnifying glasses shaking in her hands. "I... I liberated an arm! But how...?"

A flash of electricity sparked in her eyes, similar to a computer waking up from Sleep Mode. "Of course! They taught this in The Book Of Cartoon Science!" She beamed. "Like, if my toe gets hotter and wetter, the paint will put up less resistance! I'd better get some extra socks on!"

This day just kept getting better and better.

After a few terrifying footsteps, a veil of dark threads covered you; followed by another. And yet another. Sweat dripped over you. The musty sock barricades cut off your air. To make matters worse, you thought you saw a minuscule rip in the thread above you, about the size of your "bed"...

She finally stuffed on her fifth sock. The sauna of residual heat wafted on you. The ground beneath was practically melting.

Suddenly, a terrifying slosh. There was a flood of perspiration racing for you! You shivered, shook your head, struggled against the red surface...

...And tore yourself loose! You stumbled through the sock, bumping on the crisscrossing threads. Thankfully, you'd shrunken enough to slip between them; otherwise, you'd have to travel for hours simply to get to the sock's mouth. You landed on solid wood, at last.

December took her foot from the sock, and called to it. "Still there?" She pointed the magnifying lens at the ground, and grinned. "Yay! Brother Rescue Operation: success! You can thank me later. Right now, I gotta show off this polish!"

She stomped off, causing earthquakes - and leaving you on the floor, sighing. "Sure, you go, hero... Live your day to the fullest." She'd left you on the ground without any support.

Soon, someone approached...
1322222111121.title: Nail Polish Prison

choices: She dangles you in front of her mouth
She places you on a chair and hovers her butt over you
1322222112.content:
Light filling your room you cover your eyes from the brightness as you hear a familiar voice "Hey there cutie!" Adjusting to the light you see Rachael directly above you, your new size magnified her beauty tenfold at least; she had a blue strip of hair she added when she redyed her hair again, you have to admit it was quite sexy.

Examining her you saw she wore a pair of earings with quartz dangling off of them. A blue tanktop revealing a lot of cleavage was what you could see, she probably had blue jeans and a pair of her black sandals on too. Smiling you raise an arm and wave, Rachael had been surprisingly supportive since you shrunk again not even thinking of breaking up with you.

"Ugh my boobs are sooo big they're about to burst from my top!" She exclaimed as she wrapped her arms under her breasts, slightly squeezing them out of their spot in her shirt. Turning bright red you look away, Rachael had been doing this often every since you shrunk just her way of making it humorous or so you hoped.

Extending a long slender finger Rachael gently placed the endless mound of tan skin in your "room" "Come on! I have an awesome plan for today!" Feeling safe you climb onto her finger, taking 20 minutes just to get into a decent spot under her fingernail.
1322222112.title: Rachael the Tease

13222221121.content: "But first, I wanna see how you taste!"
13222221121.title: She dangles you in front of her mouth

132222211211.content: You panic as you slide down her fingernail towards the abyss below. She didn't realize this, she was used to you being able to cling to her fingernail with the tiny imperfections. Unfortunately for you, those imperfections are the size of mountains now, so you have no hand holds to keep you from falling. Eventually you reach the end of her nail, and free fall down below. Rachael seems completely unaware of this fact, and continues to give you the show of your life. After a few seconds, you finally land...
132222211211.title: continue

1322222112111.content:
As you free fall, you manage to gain a little control, and steer as far away from the monstrous cavern as possible. You watch as instead her red lips approach, and you land with a *splat*. You find yourself trapped in a thick layer of sticky, red paste. The scent of cherry overwhelms your nose. You hear a rumble, and turn your head as you feel the world move. Behind you, the 2-mile-wide lips meet together and seal shut. Rachael swings her head back down, and moves the finger you were once on back to the box that is your room. As she does this, the lips behind you open with a massive slurp, and a hurricane of air and sound blasts your body.

"Ok, mister, I think that's enough for now."

She waits for a couple minutes, then moves her hand with a waving motion before turning around and exiting the room. This is really bad, if you end up outside this house there may be no chance for you to be found. As your mind races with dozens of terrible scenarios, one of them comes true.

The mighty lips part once again, but this time a pink wall replaces the gap between them. The gigantic tongue extends, then sweeps across her lips. As it passes over you, it washes the sticky mess off of you, but what happens next?
1322222112111.title: On her lips

13222221121112.content: As the pink giant washes the lip balm off, you get knocked off Rachael's lip and into the air. You're so small that gravity has barely any time to affect you before the massive form of your girlfriend walks past, creating a swarm of turbulent winds. You have no control over your destination now, and just hope to land on something, anything. What do you end up on?
13222221121112.title: You're thrown in the air!

132222211211121.content:
You scream Rachael's name as her face lumbers past you, but it's obvious she didn't hear you. A massive forest of black cables fill your field of view. Putting your arms out, you reach out and grab onto a 12 foot wide, black cable. You slide a good few hundred feet, but slow down and get a good grip. The cable gently sways as Rachael continues to walk. You hear her voice echo through every fiber of your being:

"See you later, Melly! I'll come visit again in a couple days!"

You then hear the sound of a monstrous door opening and then closing as Rachael exits the house. Outside, her hair sways a bit more in the breeze, but you can still hold on for now. That's when you realize that her ear lays a few hundred feet away. If you could reach that, you might be able to grab her attention. However, if you fall you're stuck outside at a microscopic size. Waiting it out may be safer, as you can wait for a better chance to reach her ear. Then again, you're literally right there. What should you do?
132222211211121.title: A strand of hair

1322222112111211.content: You can't afford to leave your house: with every footstep Rachael is bringing you another 30 miles away from your house. It's do or die, and you're going to do it. You leap off the hair at the peak of the swing, and fall towards her ear lobe.
1322222112111211.title: Take the risk: Jump!

13222221121112112.content: Even with the added speed, your tiny body isn't moving fast enough to keep up with Rachael's movements. You plummet for miles, down the backside of her body. Unfortunately you're still being pulled along by the air current caused by her walking. As you fly through the air, you finally find purchase on...
13222221121112112.title: You miss

132222211211121121.content: Your body bounces on the concrete surface, and you come to a halt. In the distance, you see the enormous form of Rachael enter her car, which then deafens you as it roars to life. Wheels the size of cities roll away from you, and you are left alone on the endless plain. Behind you looms the gargantuan garage door. To your right is an expanse of tall grass covering a few stepping stones toward the front door. No matter which way you go, you're stuck wit traveling hundreds of miles back to the interior of the house. Which path will you take?
132222211211121121.title: The driveway

choices: December's friends, coming to hang out
1322222112111211211.content:
You don't like the idea of traversing hundreds of miles of dense grass, unable to see what's coming until it's on top of you. At least the garage is a shorter trip, and the wide open area means you can easily see any potential dangers. You walk for hours, and day turns to night. In the distance are the sounds of birds and crickets far larger than you. You find a microscopic pebble to rest your head on, and fall asleep.

You wake up the next morning to an earthquake. The heavenly gate that is the garage door opens, revealing a massive car inside. It roars to life, and a moment later backs up. You're safe, but in shock and awe as the enormous vehicle rolls overhead. It clears the driveway and speeds off, with the garage door closing as well. Now thoroughly awake, you continue on your way. As you make your trek, you encounter a new obstacle. It's
1322222112111211211.title: Traverse the cavernous garage

13222221121112112111.content:
You hear a rumble, but not a human-sized one. In the distance, you see a blur of brown objects approach. As they get closer, you realize you are on an ant trail! The good news is that each insect stands 700 feet tall, so they won't even consider you as food. The bad news is that they're 700 feet tall, and a single leg or feeler could easily crush you without noticing. As the first few thunder past, you realize they are heading towards the garage. Maybe you could grab onto one and shorten your trip? You watch the approaching ants, waiting for one to get close enough.

Eventually, one massive insect gets real close, its feelers a mere few feet from you. You run up and grab onto a hair, and just in time. The feeler rises in the air, tossing you up but onto the head of the ant. From their, you navigate to a wider section of the body and hang on. The ant journeys onward, moving dozens of times faster than you could run. At this rate, you could reach the inside of the house by the end of today!
13222221121112112111.title: A column of ants

132222211211121121112.content: Unfortunately, your ride is at the bottom of the food chain, and there are many creatures that would enjoy a small snack of ants. What hungry behemoth attacks?
132222211211121121112.title: Something goes wrong

choices: No, but someone's coming to clean up the garage
1322222112111211211122.content: The ants keep to their invisible trail, occasionally straying off to search for food. The convoy crawls underneath the door, and into the cool expanse that is the garage. Your ant crawls towards a table leg in one corner. You suddenly get a chill, and rightfully so. The ant snags its leg on a sticky thread of silk, and begins thrashing about. The panicked ant hurls you into the air, and on your own sticky string. You get nauseated as the ant shakes the web more and more. Wait, the vibrations are coming from behind! You turn and see a horrifying sight: a spider nearly a mile wide! The enormous arachnid easily crawls across the webbed surface, honed in on its prize. It snatches up the ant, and begins feeding. You close your eyes, but you can't block out the dreadful noises. After a few minutes, the meal is over. The spider repairs a few threads before returning to the corner, awaiting more meals. You take the opportunity to try and pry yourself off the web, and to the floor below. Of course, the sticky material can hold an ant in place: will you manage to escape by yourself?
1322222112111211211122.title: A deadly trap

13222221121112112111222.content:
Your struggling ceases when a distant crack of thunder breaks the silence. If you didn't know better, that sounded like a door opening. Massive footsteps boom through the garage. You then hear something else. It sounds like thousands of rocks scraping against on another. You finally see movement, as one of your family moves past. A massive wall of beige fills your view, and as it approaches you notice it is made of hundreds of thick fibers, as large as a building.

...

Uh oh.

Before long, the broom sweeps right over you. The straw easily shreds the web, catching you and the spider. You are sent for a ride as the broom is swept across the garage floor. It stops for a moment, as a monolithic plastic dam appears before you. The mountain of dust and dirt is swept inside it. The spider falls and lands in the dustpan, but thankfully you keep your grip on the fibers. You're lifted one last time in the air, before the broom is placed against the wall. The unaware goddess then returns inside, leaving you alone. Well, the good news is that you are now that much closer to safety. You slide down the broom fibers, and find yourself only a foot away from the door. You could make that trip quite easily before night time! With your hope reinvigorated, you start walking once again.

You can see the light slowly recede from the sky behind you. A rumble fills the air, as your mother's car arrives in the garage. The rumbling engine knocks you down and shakes the earth, until it finally shuts off. The door opens, and your mother exits. She walks towards the door, closes the garage door, and heads inside. Unfortunately, you're in her path. A high heel that dwarfs any mountain slams down above you, the spike sitting mere inches from your face. A crazy idea hits you: what if you caught a ride from your mother?
13222221121112112111222.title: A stroke of luck

choices: You jump free and onto the bed.
You stay on the she as she discards them in the closet.
132222211211121121112221.content: The sooner you can get back inside, the quicker you can get to safety. You find a tiny pit in the heel, too small to even be considered a dent but big enough to hold you. You jump in and grab tight as the monolith lifts into the air, passing through the door. It's surprisingly easy to hang on as your mother walks through the house. Reaching her bedroom, she sits down and takes off her high heels. Gravity rotates as you are swept high into the air, over your mother's bed! You see a massive hand reach for the shoe. Panic sets in, do you react in time?
132222211211121121112221.title: Grab on

choices: One of your sisters come in, wanting to try the high heels
1322222112111211211122212.content: Frozen in fear, you can only watch as your mom's bed flies out of sight. The high heel crashes into a pile of shoes, knocking you loose. Tumbling onto the sole of the shoe, you watch the light above you disappear as your mom closes the door. You can still somewhat see, as the door has an infinitesimal gap underneath it, plenty big for you to sneak through. Of course, that's miles away.
1322222112111211211122212.title: You stay on the she as she discards them in the...

13222221121112112111222122.content: Suddenly the light appears again, showing _____'s face as she reaches for the high heels you are on!
13222221121112112111222122.title: One of your sisters come in, wanting to try the...

132222211211121121112222.content: Hitching a ride from someone nearly a million times your size does not seem like a good idea. You start to walk away from the heel, but not before it lifts up, sucking all the nearby air up with it, you included. Your body starts to follow, but as she closes the door behind her the air currents change, sending you towards...
132222211211121121112222.title: Play it safe

13222221121112112112.content: The ground begins to rumble with multiple earthquakes at once. In the distance, five monolithic shapes approach from the driveway. As they get closer, you recognize they are people, and there's only one group of five that ever comes here: December's friends. You can never remember their names, but you know there's two guys and three girls. Running isn't much of an option here, so you just hide in the biggest hole you can find. You soon find yourself amidst ten massive pillars as the group walk to the front door. There were several close calls with the city-sized shoes, the last of which sucked enough air up with it to send you flying. You landed on...someone, but who?
13222221121112112112.title: December's friends, coming to hang out

1322222112111211212.content:
This is going to take a few days, and in that time your family will be coming in and out. If you're on the driveway or in the garage, you'll surely be crushed by a car. Plus, you'll get some shade from the burning sun. You just hope that you're too small for any insects to bother you. You take a deep breath, and jog towards the seemingly endless jungle.

The journey is a nightmare. All about you are the noises of, well, nature and the neighborhood. However, all those sounds are amplified: birds chirping become the terrifying calls of enormous predators; monstrous squirrels bound about, creating earthquakes as they explore; even ants are now a threat, as they trample through the underbrush. The distant rumble of a lawnmower or sprinkler sends a shiver down your spine, as you don't know when those might go off in your yard. A couple times, the monolithic steps of a human rumble past: some from the sidewalk far off, and a few from your family as they come in and out. It's only a matter of time before something goes wrong.
1322222112111211212.title: The grass jungle

13222221121112112121.content:
Boom. BOOM. BOOM. BOOM.

The tell-tale quakes caused by walking approach you. Meanwhile, a shadow stretches out for miles in front of you. There's something behind you. Something close. Something big. What is it?
13222221121112112121.title: An animal crosses your path

choices: Fleas, each bigger than a mountain!
1322222112111211212111.content:
MEOW!

You look on in terror as your neighbor's cat appears before you! The scale of the gargantuan beast is FAR bigger than you can possibly comprehend, and it's meowing deafening to you! You're much too tiny for the behemoth to be able to see, but that doesn't make it's presence any less dangerous to you. You turn to run as the beast lifts it's mammoth paw to take a step, but at your size even traveling an inch would take hours! The impact of the cat's paw crashing down sends you air-born, the wind currents like a violent tornado to you making you lose consciousness as your tumble back toward the ground.

When you wake up, you find yourself in what appears to be a strange forest-like place. Huge branchless trees cover the landscape, extending above farther than you can see. You suddenly realize that these enormous "trees" are, in fact, strands of fur! You're on your neighbor's cat!

---------------------------

You have no idea how much time has passed since you first realized that the strange world you now found yourself in was, in fact, the cat from next door. You simply keep walking. It's been a relatively peaceful journey so far, other then the frequent 10-point earthquakes that occur as a result of the cat moving. Suddenly, you start to feel growing tremors. The ground quakes more and more violently, and you realize something VERY big is approaching! What is it?
1322222112111211212111.title: Cat

13222221121112112121113.content:
The neighbor’s cat was one of only a few in the entire neighborhood, and, unfortunately for you, it was the only one that was allowed outside the house. It did not run away or get into too much trouble, provided nothing spooked it too badly. You would occasionally watch it on the days your mother would put you on the window to see the outside world. You decided long ago that they were not for you.

The cat meandered around the yard, enjoying the sun and the warmth it provided. It caught and ate a lizard, lay down, the. Got back up again to walk to the edge of the road. It would often watch people and vehicles pass by. At the moment, however, it felt the powerful feline urge to clean itself. It promptly collapsed onto its belly and dragged its tongue against its furry ribs.

The ground shakes so violently that you aren’t just knocked off your feet, your actually blown an inch or two into the air. You double over on the middle of a hair and straddle it with a little effort. “That’s concerning,” you murmur nervously. From your spot on the hair, you can actually see a bit of the outside world, and that’s the part that terrifies you. What you see is the cat’s massive head approaching, eyes closed and jaws agape. Massive white fangs pass overhead, each one longer than a skyscraper. You are frozen with fear as it’s mouth eclipses the light above.

The sound is what you perceive next, like trees slamming against one another in a storm. You look toward the source and let out a panicked scream. A pink wall of terrifying spikes rushes toward you, pinning down every hair in its wake. Above it lies he dark red of the feline’s cavernous gullet. The tongue drags slowly, to you at least, across the animal’s fur until it reaches you. All you can do it brace for impact.

The spiky tongue washes over you, giving you a powerful whiff of everything it’s eaten in the last week or so. Darkness overtakes your world for what seems like a minute before passing by. You’ve been spared! You look up and see the cat’s neck drawing back to start over and make a hasty decision. You jump down toward the cat’s skin to avoid being caught up on its tongue.
13222221121112112121113.title: The cat's tongue (it's cleaning itself)!

You only get a moment to realize what's about to come before an enormous pillar breaches the sky just a mile away from you, releasing a spray of water. You take a moment to climb a fiber and get a view of the surrounding area. You're just inside the hallway, in the middle of the rug. 13222221122112.content:
As your madly kissing your planet sized girlfriend’s bottom lip, you stopped worrying about everything else. The fact that some bacteria were bigger then you didn’t bother you anymore. The fact that you could take a bath in a sweat pore didn’t bother you. The fact that you could live comfortably in one of the wrinkles on Rachel’s lips didn’t bother you. Nothing could bother you right now as you experienced real physical contact with another person since shrinking to microscopic proportions on Christmas.

“What’s going on here?”

Everything was a blur next, you felt yourself being pulled away from the glossy, soft comfort of Rachel’s lips and being held hundreds of miles in the air between two mountains sized fingers. Far, far away, you see your mother’s face, red and angry, and Rachel even further away, looking embarrassed.

“How dare you do this to my son! You could have killed him or worse! What were you thinking? Get out! Get out! Get Out!” The volume of your mom’s voice makes you tremble all over and get dizzy. Everything is so different at your near particle size, you’re mother’s voice could send you rocketing back if not for her grip on you. With your head still throbbing from your mom’s booming screams, you watched Rachel grab her clothes of the floor, give you one last look and rush out of the room. You think this might be the last time you will ever see Rachel again.

“The nerve of her,” your mother huffs and slowly carries you over to a tall dresser. Placing you carefully down, she looks at her dot of a son with a frazzled smile. “Last time we’ll be seeing her.”

“But wait! Mom, you can’t!” You begin to scream, but your mother either ignores you or can’t hear you right now, considering your size it’s probably the latter. Watching her go, you slump back onto your butt, lost in thought over what your life had become.

Being only 1/100th of an inch tall had been no walk in the park, but growing up that size, you learned to adapt. But this near size, so small the tinniest bug was the size of Godzilla, was horrible in so many more ways. You couldn’t leave the house, everything was a threat to you and now you couldn’t even be with Rachel. You have nothing now. This wasn’t life, it was a life sentence. You know what you need to do.

132222211221121.content:
In your depression you collapsed onto the desk your mother left you on, staring at the ceiling with tears forming on the edges of your eyes. Various thoughts went through your mind, mainly memories of the good old days when you were 1/100 of an inch.

You instantly began comparing your old life style to your current one and even someone as stupid as December or as young as Milly would have seen the dramatic difference. At 1/100 of an inch you had a life, a dangerous life granted but a life all the same. at 1/1000 of an inch you had virtually no contact with anyone outside of your family except for Rachael and it looks like that just ended too.

You remember several times an old friend or a relative coming over and asking if you had died; your mother being the over protective woman she was did in fact say you were dead as a means of protecting you, she didnt want to risk your well being at something like a family get together.

You've been slowly missing out on Melly too, eventually she'll probably forget she even had a brother at this rate. December...well with her intellect there was no telling what would happen in the future in her case. Worst of all was Mom, with her stressed state she may actually imprison you with something like some jewelry or her ear, some place where she could keep you safe.

Deep in thought about your life you mutter aloud a conclusion "Things need to change."

So you began your plan, plotting out a speech for you Mom next time you saw her.

BOOM

"Speak of the Devil" You mutter, Mom was on her way. With the ever familiar rythmic booms of her foot steps she stepped into the room and happily looked at you, several magnifying glasses in hand.

You sighed, this was going to break your moms heart but it was the only way to go.

"Whats wrong dear?" Mom asked, with her magnifying glasses she could see you were upset.

With a determined expression you point to your ear, a gesture that you used when you wanted to talk with Mom. Her eyes filled with understanding as she pulled out her ever trusty tweezers and lifted you up.

Gently your Mom placed you fairly deep in her ear, "What is it hunny?" She sounded so innocent, almost happy....this would be devastating.

With a deep breath you began, "Mom.....I love you, I love all of you, even Milly and December but this just isn't working. This isn't life this is effectively a prison sentence."

"Why hunny tha-" You cut her off. "Its torture! I haven't done anything remotely interesting in months! All I had that kept me happy was Rachael and even now you just ruined it with her! I'm missing out on so much, school....friends......even my own damn family! When was the last time I actually got to spend any time with Milly?"

"But dear its...." Again you cut off your Mom. "Its too dangerous I know but you want to know the truth..I actually dont care at all! I'd rather live one nice day then the rest of my life like this! I'm telling you this so that you will understand, although I may not seem like it due to my size I AM a person and I deserve to live like one. Please Mom, I intend on living like this even if you say no. The least you can do is support me....."

You let your voice drag off, a lone tear sliding down your cheek. You felt bad at what you had just said but it had to be done, now all that was left was to see how Mom would react.

Each second that passed seemed like an eternity, Mother's tears and sniffles continued and seemed to only get worse while you leaned guiltily in her ear. You didn't say a word all the while your Mom cried, you figured you had done enough damage, anything you said to comfort her would either make things worse or be a lie.

Ten minutes passed, and finally the tears started to slow down, not because she was getting better but because physically she was losing her ability to cry at the moment. As far as you knew your sisters weren't around, or they were avoiding their very upset Mom.

Soon your Mom managed to speak a solid sentence, her voice sounding weak. "Are you sure?" Her voice told you that she was hoping you would say no.

"Yes" You respond, kicking at her ear wax like you were bored.

A long silence ensued, your mother was thinking of what to say next; you could practically hear her brain rattling.

"Really?!" You shout, tears of happiness sliding down your cheeks.

You Mother spoke again, her voice naught but a whisper. "Yes.....I'll be worrying more than ever but you're right. You can't live like this."

"It's not li-" You tried to plead but was cut off.

"It is like that! This life you have right now isnt bad its just not exciting enough for you. Well I hate to burst your bubble but life not only sucks but is boring too! You honestly think you got it bad?"

"I'm a 1/1000 of an inch tall!" You scream, starting to get mad yourself.

"And lifes been real easy for you! You want excitement? I'll give your ungrateful ass excitement!"
1322222112211212.title: Moms anger

choices: She slips you out onto her shoe and makes you climb her foot.
She's calmed down and forgives you....
13222221122112121.content:
You Mom jammed her finger into her ear, roughly using her nail to drag you out with a seeming disregard for your safety. You tried desperately to wrap your hands around something but Mom's ear had nothing to grab onto so you had no choice but to be scooped up by the mile high nail.

With you in her nail Mom raised her finger before her eye, at point blank range she could make out your tiny frame, you cowered at the god like eye of your Mother filled with anger.

"Don't be scared mister! You wanted excitement I'll give you excitement! Let's see how you last a day in my work shoes!" Your Mom looked like she snapped, your speech might have pulled that last straw. With loud stomps your Mom stepped before a pair of black high heels, almost dastardly slow she reached downwards and slammed her finger into the shoe where she then wiggled it so that your miniature body would topple off and into her insole.

With a squelching noise you landed on the insole and immediately began coughing, you were in your Mother's only pair of work shoes and thus they were very worn out and were filled with the aroma of her feet.

"Time to go!" Your Mother's anger filled voice piped up as she slipped her foot slowly into her shoe. At the moment you heard your Mother, instinctively you looked up and felt goosebumps cover your body, it wasn't the site of your Mother's near planetary toes, it wasn't the thought of being an insole to your Mother's colossal feet, it was the split second you saw her face; her eyes...they shined with something you had never seen before, almost as if they were telling you that your Mom lost her thought of you as her child and that thought terrified you more than anything else possibly could.

Your Mother slipped her foot into her shoe and was off, making sure to stomp her way to the car. By some sort of a lucky break you were safe, your legs were firmly pinned beneath the skin in between her first and second toes. Not tight enough to crush your limbs, but enough so that you wouldn't be bouncing around everywhere.

Of course the safety came at a price, being between the seemingly neverending walls of your Mother's toes meant that the odor had to be magnified at least tenfold and any sweat she would work up during the day would be deposited between her toes and thus onto you.

The day continued, at first you were truly terrified but after your Mom arrived at work things got dull, she had one of those desk jobs so she wasn't walking anymore. The only problems were her occasionally playing with her foot and the fact the buildings air conditioning was broken. The loss of the AC took its toll not only on your Mom but you too, it had to be at least a hundred degrees in her shoe and the added heat from the lack of air conditioning made it into a sauna where you and her feet were sweating bullets.

As you thought, many beads of this sweat deposited onto you but in this heat it cooled you off, so although you were covered in a salty foul smelling liquid you were otherwise fine. At least, until your Mom took you out......
13222221122112121.title: Joining Mom for work.

choices: You say "I only spoke the damn truth!"
132222211221121211.content:
Light suddenly filled your dark work, blinding you for moments. Almost like in the movies, the outline of your Mom began to appear....almost angelically.

"Has she forgiven me?" You asked yourself.

The blinding light cleared to show your Mom's rage filled face, "Guess not."

Your Mother once again roughly scooped you up with her nail, depositing you on the very tip of her big toe.

"Just because I got a desk job don't think you're gonna have it easy mister! While I'm here you are going to climb my foot."

You shrugged, a little excersise never hurt, but Mom wasn't finished.

"However........You'll be on all fours, licking the skin as you crawl over it like an animal bent on pleasing its goddess." Your Mom smiled a horrifying smile.

You couldn't argue, she was too angry for that and plus, it wasn't like she would be able to hear you right? With a tint of red embarassment on your face you got down on all fours, regretting what you said earlier. And thus you began to crawl, dragging your tongue along your Mother's sweat covered feet.

"I always knew you loved my feet hun, maybe we can make this a regular thing." Although you couldn't see it your Mom winked.

"I hope not." You mutter before licking again. The task you performed alone was nothing, all it was was long,boring, and humiliating. Not like you could complain though so you continue your crawl. Your Mother's foot was a continent in essence, almost neverending. It would be impossible to reach the end of her foot in one day.

Several hours later it was confirmed when your Mother told you work was over.

"Now do you regret was you said dear?" This was possibly your chance to save yourself.
132222211221121211.title: Long,boring and degrading

She tells the family that they have a new "pet"
1322222112211212112.content:
"I only spoke the damn truth!" You pointed an accusing finger at your Mother, who seemed galaxies away to you.

She leaned forward, looking confused, "I'm sorry could you repeat that?" She cranked her unnecessary hearing aid to full.

Whether she couldn't believe what you said or actually didn't hear it was irrelevant, you repeated yourself. "I only spoke the damn truth! Just like you taught me!" You immediately regretting saying that.

Your Mom spoke with such a tone, it wasn't filled with anger or rage yet it felt far worse......as if her voice was filled with hate, not childish hate that will vanish in no time, true eternal hate for one who is insignificant to you and you honestly believe that they do not deserve anything they have; this was the way your Mother's voice seemed.

"Matt....." You gasped, she has never EVER called you by your name. " I honestly expected better of you. Throughout all of your life you have shown yourself to be a bright and intelligent boy yet you failed to realize a vital lesson.....Sometimes it is better to lie than to tell a truth that hurts the ones you love. I'm afraid what you said has been done and cannot be taken back and repercussions will be swift..." The tone alone was enough to make you lose the feeling in your legs.

Before you could respond your Mother did the unthinkable, something that even in your....'interesting' lifestyle had never been done before, she spat on you. Still unable to control your legs you looked up at the meteor of saliva descending upon you, making imminent contact.

With what seemed like a tidal wave the disgusting liquid flowed over you, completely drenching you with its....unique feeling. Eventually underneath the liquid you began to lose your breath and instinctively attempted to swim up, only to fail, the liquid was simply too sticky. You began to cough for air and in the process of doing so swallowed some of the saliva.

You began to feel lightheaded, believing death to be imminent but your Mother used her finger to wipe away most of the saliva, saving you from her own method to kill you.

With renewed will you got out and onto your Mother's dry foot, gasping for air despite it being filled with the scent of feet.

"It should be taking effect soon....." Your Mom muttered ominously. It was then that it happened, the feeling you would never forget in your life, the feeling of shrinking once more. You saw what were canyon wrinkles in your Mother's foot escalate into something that dwarfed the Grand Canyon in depth and Mt.Rushmore in height.

All you could do was look up at your Mom and mutter one word, the last she will probably ever hear from you, "How..........."

Surprisingly your Mother actually smiled, in this horrific event she smiled! " I bought you hundreds of those pills that the doctors would believe to cure you Matt, you only ate one. I decided once I left home that if you failed to see the error of your words I would slip you another pill. So I placed one in my mouth, letting it wither away into my saliva. And once you insulted me again I spat the tainted saliva onto you. It was a risky manuever but had to be done."

You were horrified, you finally realized it, that speech you gave your Mother earlier did the worst possible thing, it made her finally snap, your Mom was officially crazy and it was your fault. Without logic to hold her back there was no telling what she would do....
1322222112211212112.title: Sometimes its better to lie

13222221122112121121.content:
Then your mother put her shoes back on. The light was cut off and you were left standing on your mother’s foot scared and confused. What was your mother doing now? Was she just going to leave you on her foot until she got home and let you think about your microscopic-microscopic new life? You no longer knew what your new size was now. You had started off at 1/100th of an inch, and then shrunk down so far it took two magnifying glasses to see you and now that insignificant size would be considered giant. You were so small; a million of you couldn’t fill up a wrinkle on your mothers big toe.

Just lost in thought about how small you had become, time sped by in the dark confines of your mother’s shoe. The thick smell of feet and sweat became a second thought as you wondered what you were going to do. You had always wondered how people had come to see and hear you when you were so small. You had assumed the people around you became used to your size and adapted, but at this size, you weren’t sure anyone could see you if you were standing on their eye or hear you if you were inside there ear. By all accounts, you were invisible.

Eventually, the sun returns when your mother gets home and took her shoes off. Surprisingly, you weren’t shuffled around as much as you should have when your mother walked. It was interesting. You wave up to your mom, hoping to get her to talk to you or at least acknowledge you.

“MOM! COME ON, LETS TALK! I’M SORRY!”

Your screaming at the top of your lungs, but your mother doesn’t respond. You can’t even see if she’s registering your response because her face is so far away. When you squint your eyes and look up as far as you can, you can just see beyond your mom’s ankle. A foot to you is nearly a thousand miles away, making it impossible to see not much else, but miles and miles of your mom’s foot. You can’t see anything away her foot because it’s too far away as well. You wait and listen for your mother’s voice, but after an hour of listening, you hear nothing. With horror, you realize that unless her mouth is hovering over you, the sound won’t reach you’re puny ears. Her voice might sound like the booming roar of a million thunderstorms, but it was still thousands of miles away. Your were blind and deaf on your mom’s foot until she brought her country sized face down to address you.

An hour passes and then another and another. You don’t know if your sisters have mentioned your disappearance, you’re not sure of anything. You wait and wait, until it sinks in, your mother is pretending you aren’t there, like you never existed.

Things only get worse for your state of mind when your mother gets ready for bed. The lights disappear and you can feel everything shake as your mother lies down. Grabbing onto a flack of skin as big as your whole body, you hold on for dear life. But you don’t slid down, you don’t fall off, your whole world has turned horizontal, but you’re able to stand up strait. Then you start laughing, realizing what was happening. It was gravity; you were in your mother’s gravitational pull. You didn’t fall of the earth when you got to the South Pole, gravity kept you from falling off. The same gravity keeping you from falling of your mother’s foot. You’re mother had literally become your world.

“Please look for me. Please see me. Please don’t leave me on here to…to…to….” You plead in a whisper, knowing the volume of your voice made little difference. Spending your entire life invisible on your mother’s foot with no way to escape. If that wasn’t hell, you didn’t know what was.

132222211221121211212211.title: December

choices: Mom shrunk you she gets first dibs
13222221122112121122.content:
Your Mother turned her attention back to the world around her, gathering her things and preparing to return to the car. "Once we get home I'm going to tell your sisters of the family's new 'pet'" You were about to question what exactly your Mom meant when you realized it, the 'pet' was you.

Without making the slightest warning or gesture your Mother slipped her foot back into her shoe and immediately departed her work place. She didn't bother to speak to you again til you were both in the car, her safely in a buckled car seat and you within one of the millions of Grand Canyons that were her foot wrinkles.

"Now that you're a pet it's time to lay down some new rules. First and foremost you are to refer to me,Melly, and December as Goddesses, if either Melly or December has a friend over to play with you the rule applies with them as well. Next, your name will no longer be Matt, thats the name of my recently deceased son, now you can just be.......I suppose Micro-Slave will suffice. The next one I'm sure will seem obvious but we own you, body and soul, if Milly wants you to clean her diaper do it, if December wants her heels spotless for a dance they better be spotless, if I wanted the kitchen floor licked clean it better be licked clean!"

You were horrified, without reason to hold her back your Mom was in actuality a goddess compared to you, her face was galaxies and galaxies away in distance yet her voice still held the power to nearly burst your ear drums. What was worst of all was the thought of your Sisters, it was obvious that December would relish the idea of a Micro-Slave, and Melly....well with her there is no telling.

Your Mother took a deep breath before continuing, " Next.....if you fail to do a satisfatory job to the person who ordered you then you will recieve the strictest punishment from me. And lastly, this isn't a rule, simply something you should know; that pill I gave you, not only shrunk you down even more but it makes you elastic or in other words unable to be killed by.... say crushing you."

You perked up, the thought of dying soon was perhaps one of your few comforts in these dark times. You wondered what horrors your Mother would continue to tell you but the car began pulling up into your driveway. Mother didn't leave immediately however, she first removed her foot and with the magnifying glasses she carried found and removed you from a wrinkle in her foot, carelessly balancing you on planetary fingernail.

At your Mother's foot you missed just how small you had become, but on her nail you saw much more and realized it. The first time you shrunk again you were a 1/100 of your size at the time, taking the pill again replicated this, now you were 1/10000 of an inch tall, bordering the molecular level.

Upon entering the house your Mother screamed "MELLY DECEMBER!!!" The two girls flew towards her at an amazing speed, believing themselves to be in trouble.

Your Mom smiled, "We have a new pet." She pulled out yet another magnifying glass and focused on her nail.

Melly was the first to find you "Brother really really small!!"

December nodded "Yeah, he's like a centimeter tall." You instantly rolled your eyes, "idiot" Quickly your Mother retold the rules she had set for you, December was shaking with excitement the whole time but Melly didn't seem to understand.

December turned to her, "We can do whatever we want to Micro-Slave" Melly made noises of understanding, leave it to December to dumb something down.

Your Mother drew their attention again, "Now who shall get to spend some time with our new pet first?"
13222221122112121122.title: New Life, New rules, New Problems

132222211221121211221.content:
December pushed away your mothers hand, "You shrunk him even further, you deserve to use him first."

With a genuinly happy smile your mother, no Goddess Karen nodded, "Thank you hunny thats so sweet. But before I go to my room, it's not 'him' it's 'it' calling our Micro-Slave him is encinuating he's still remotely human."

Hearing all this you were stunned, not just by December's sudden refusal to torture you but by the fact that Goddess Karen was so far gone, it finally registered to you that you were nothing more than a maggot to her now, destined to be her pet for possibly all eternity.

Lost in thought it took the rhtymic booms of Karen's footsteps to alarm you, she was heading for her room. Looking back you see your two goddesses of sisters giggling to eachother in glee, no doubt talking about you. A lone tear slid down your cheek, this had to be a horrific dream it just had to be; there was no way God or the world itself would allow such injustice to happen to such an innocent one, but the fact remained it did happen and is going to get worse.

A loud slamming noise said your Goddess was now in her room again, using your eyes you confirmed it despite it being almost unrecognizable from your new size.

Sitting on her bed Goddess Karen crossed her legs, resting her open palm on her knee, "What to do with my little Micro-Slave first? What do you want?"

Given the opportunity you screamed wildly for Karen to return to her motherly self, but in the midst of your pleas she laughed. "You know I can't hear you, and besides slaves don't have a say in what happens around here. Only goddesses do." She wore that evil smirk that struck fear in your heart.

You could only lie in one of your Mother's hand wrinkles as she decided your first task as nothing more than a slave...
132222211221121211221.title: Mother goes first

choices: Clean her ears while you have a conversation with her
Clean the rigid between her feet.
1322222112211212112211.content:
“I KNOW.” Your mothers voice booms from far above as you sit in one of her hand wrinkles.

“YOU CAN MOISTURIZE MY LIPS WITH YOUR TONGUE.”

Your ears where ringing from how powerful your mother’s voice actually was, but in the end you could understand her words, even if it was just barely.

“You can’t be serious.” You say. You couldn’t believe that your goddess would do such a thing to you, she did use to be your mother after all. But all your beliefs, all of your hopes and dream where for not, as Karen brings her hand closer and closer to her planet sized face. Your puny fragile body was pinned down to the fleshy ground as G-force presses you into Karen’s flesh. The G-force soon disappears, allowing you to stand on your own two feet. You where still inside Karen’s hand wrinkle, so you felt relatively safe, but for how long. You soon realize the presence before you. You where right in front of your mothers gigantic face. Her face was miles and miles away to you, but you knew that to Karen it was only a few inches. Karen was so massive compared to you that you couldn’t even make out the entirely of her visage. You where just to close. You at this moment stood before a moon sized eye which stared at you with great intensity.

“MY LIPS HAVE BEEN DRY ALL DAY, SO THAT WILL BE YOUR TASK SLAVE.” Karen says with a smile, and a wink, both of which you could really make out.

The wind starts to pick up around you. Blowing your hair and close into a frenzy. You knew that this wind came from Karen talking, and her breathing. Goddess Karen truly was massive beyond belief.

Karen lays down on her bed 🛌. Her movement rocks you to your very core, and makes you go tumbling inside the massive wrinkle in your mothers hand. Your body with great force hits the walls that made up your mothers canyon sized wrinkles. Karen barely noticed.

“I HOPE YOU DON’T THINK YOU CAN HIDE FROM ME LITTLE MAN, OVER THE YEARS MY EYE SIGHT HAS BECOME MORE ACCUTE, SO YOU WILL HAVE TO DO BETTER THAN HIDING IN ONE OF MY WRINKLES TO FOOL ME SLAVE.” Karen says with a booming voice.

Karen Tilts her hand to a 90 degree angle. You hold on to her hand fleas with all of your strength. You looked toward the bottomless abyss that layer below you and you say your mother’s gigantic face, or to be more precise her gigantic lips. Karen wore a lustful smile, she knew the inevitable outcome, and even though you didn’t want to believe it so did you. This had only one ending, but you still held on, refusing to give Karen the satisfaction of being right.

“OH SO YOU WANT TO DO THIS THE HARD WAY, YOU LITTLE MAGGOT, SO BE IT..... TRY NOT TO GET SUCKED IN.”

“Sucked in?” You say still hanging from your mothers flesh.

After a few seconds had passed you realize that the wind started to get stronger and stronger, and soon it was out of control. A wind storm raged all around you, you didn't know where it was coming from, until you looked towards your mothers face. You where terrified, and shocked beyond belief. Goddess Karen with her massive lips pursed was inhaling a lot of air every second. She was trying to suck you into her mouth. While looking at Karen’s humongous face you came to the conclusion that she wasn’t using the fool power of her lungs to breath in oxygen, you doubted that she was using a 10th of her power to try to capture you. you Knew that if Karen didn’t control her breath you would be tarred apart from the force her lips generated.

You were out of options, you where using 100% of your strength and more, but the longer you held on the stronger the winds became. Soon you where falling, falling at great almost super sonic speed towards the black hole the was in the middle of your mothers pursed lips, that seemed to get bigger and bigger the closer you came to them. You believe that this was the end. Your destiny was to be devoured by your planet sized mother, a small tear escapes your eyes, your last thoughts being of Rachel. You closed your eyes ready to embrace your end.

“Flop.”

Your body lands on something soft. You open your eyes to see a pinkish landscape filled with deep cannons. The pinkish landscape went on more miles, you couldn’t see the Ned of it no matter how much you tried.

“GOTCHA.”

you fall to your need covering your ears with both your hands, protecting them from the overwhelming voice that surrounded you. You knew where you where and you didn’t like it.

“NOW START CLEANING SLAVE, DO NOT DISAPPOINT ME OR YOU WILL BE PUNISHED.”

The goddess that used to be your mother spoke with intimidation in her thundering voice. She wanted you clean her lips with your tongue 👅 deep down you where not looking forward to that. You with all of your heart hoped that this didn’t count as a kiss.

“GET TO WORK!” Karen yells, hurting your ear drums even more.

You slowly get on your hands and knees and start to lick your mothers giant lips, that where big enough to hold a few hundred Contents with ease.

Karen lays back in her bed with her eyes close, concentrating on her little slave on her lips. She could just barely feel him as he licked her lips, a smile formed on her face, a smile that unknowingly to her made you tumble into one of her many lip wrinkles.

You climb out of your goddesses wrinkles and continue your task. You lick her lips for seemingly a long time. You just wanted this to end, your tongue was beginning to go dry, and deep down you knew that you didn’t even finish even a inch of your mother’s massive lips 👄

“OK THATS ENOUGH MAGGOT.” You hear you goddesses voice echo all around you as you cover your ears.

You soon see something descending from the heavens, something massively huge that made you tremble in fear. It was Karen’s finger and it was headed right towards you with great speed, of course you didn’t know that Karen was actually going as slow as she could, so she didn’t hurt you, she didn’t care for your safety of course, she just had more chores for you to do and you couldn’t do them if you where injured. The finger soon landed a few miles away from you. You looked at the finger that completely toward over you. You where so small that you could see the dirt in between her finger prints that made the Grand Canyon look small.

“CLIMB ON MY FINGER NAIL.” Your goddess demanded

You begin your walk to the goddesses finger nail, a few minutes had passed and you where still in her lips.

“HURRY UP AND GET OFF OF MY LIPS OR ILL LICK YOU OFF AND SWALLOW YOU.” Goddess Karen says getting tired of waiting.

You begin to sprint towards the massive nail, as you feel Karen’s lips begin to vibrate. Karen was slowly opening her mouth. As you ran you looked behind you to see a massive pink tung, able to lick up contents, appear from the left hand side of her mouth. Karen was beginning to lick her lips. You could see the details of her tung, you could see the taste buds that looked like skyscrapers to you, and the oceans and oceans of saliva. You knew that you wouldn’t be able to survive your mothers tung if it caught you. This only made you sprint faster.

You jump off your mothers lips as the tung moves a few inches past you. You where sweating and breathing very hard. That was to close for comfort.

“OH YOU MADE IT. GOOD FOR YOU... KEEP MOVING.” Karen says almost sounding disappointed, she didn’t get to eat you.

You are to Karen’s nail and was amazed that even the side of the nail toward over you with ease. You began to climb the rigid nail, and after a few minute you where safely on top of your mothers nail. Being so close to Karen’s nail you could see all of the imperfections that where once invisible to you when you where bigger.

Karen brings you up to her right eye and looks at you cowering in between her nail and her flesh. Karen loved to see you cower in fear. You where no longer her son, she didn’t have to hold back. Karen looks at you for a few minutes. You didn’t do a good job in Karen’s eyes, but you didn’t do a bad job ether. In your eyes it was like looking into the eyes of god himself.

“I GUESS YOU DID A SATISFACTORY JOB, FOR ONCE. BUT IM FOING TO NEED MORE THAN SATISFACTORY IN THE FUTURE.” Karen says revealing her high expectations.

What she wanted you to do was impossible, you could not clean the wide surface of her lips it was impossible.

“SO WHAT SHOULD I MAKE YOU DO NOW?”
1322222112211212112211.title: You are to "Moisturize" Her lips

Big shocker, she's proud of you!!
1322222112211212112212.content:
It took seconds for your goddess to choose, the choice she picked was perhaps the worst thing you could think of. With a smirk Karen muttered the booms that were her command. " You spent the day at my feet, I don't see any reason to change that. You can lick my shoes,sandals, and boots clean; and I mean the insides, not the outsides. And don't expect me to help you out, you gotta learn how to sink or swim like a big boy. You got three hours, and just because I'm so so nice I'll give you a helping hand."

Barely catching that entire speech through the almost unintelligible booms all you caught was the command and the time limit, not your goddess's idea of helping you out. Well...you did catch it but by then she was already starting.

That enormous finger that you were slowly growing used to came near by, positioned against the thumb in an ever familiar motion. Oddly you didn't bother escaping, or even trying to; all you did was brace yourself for the ineveitable impact.

As expected it came, the woman you began to see as a goddess instead of a mother flicked you. Pain surged throughout every orifice of your body, almost like your whole entire body was getting crushed by a mere flick; like a bug. And like a bug somehow you survived, but the sheer power of it caused you to go flying what seemed like dozens upon dozens of miles away from Karen.

You were certain if the flick didn't get you the landing would, but a soft surface broke your fall. Bewildered you looked around, with your serverly windblown hair you appeared as a madman. Wherever you were it was dark, dank, the ground was soft to the touch but it had small little holes everywhere; plus there was this odor that seemed so familiar yet somehow you forgot just what it was.

"Bullseye" You heard Karen mutter, several booms came afterwards telling you she had left the room. As the first boom made its noise you remembered what this stench was, amazed at how quickly you had forgotten. It was the smell of Karen's feet. Granted it was musty like the foot wear had not been worn in ages but the smell was still so strong it was amazing the connection didn't come before you even landed.

With the realization Karen's order returned back to mind, the small little fibers of cloth all around you. The floor, ceiling, and walls of this immense cavern...you were to lick it clean. It was a disgusting notion, but you already had been subjucated to Karen's feet and this was probably easier.

You yourself didn't know if this was a conscious move but your legs gave way and quickly you fell to the squishy sweat filled insole. Laying flat on your front your face was buried in the leather and reluctantly your mouth opened and your tongue came out; grinding against the insole your goddess wore.

The taste was more or less the same as your own mothers feet, only older; sort of like food that was a day old. A little tear slid down your cheek, this was your life now and you would have to come to terms with that. The tear dripped onto the leather where you quickly licked it up before it soaked into the material.

This is how you did it, morally weak you crawled around the cavernous foot wear, licking all the while your torso never left the insole.
