Mighty earthquakes stronger than any that had come before, rocked the ground, knocking you off your feet and throwing you to the ground. You laying in the ground soon notices that the ant had stopped moving, and had also turned away from you looking at the closet door that toward in the distant. Something was coming, something bigger than both you and the giant ant combined, and you both knew it. You felt relieved maybe now you would finally get some help. The light underneath the closet door soon disappears, alerting both you and the ant that someone was standing right behind the door. The question was who.

The sound of metal grinding against each other fills the air, as the closet door begins to open lighting up the dark closet room, in which you and the ant stood. Right before your eyes was a visage you had bore witness to your whole entire life, 5 mighty gigantic toes toward 100s of miles away. Toes that made even the 50 foot ant seem small in comparison. You glance towards the giant ant and see the ant starting to back away in fright.

“Wow how the tables had turned.” You say with a smile.

“OH MY GOD AN ANT, HOW DID YOU GET INSIDE HERE YOU LITTLE INSECT?”

You recognized that voice. You look up at the giantess that toward over you in the distant. You couldn’t see her face, which was obscured by her gigantic boobs, but you knew that voice. It was your girlfriend Racheal.

“Racheal thank god!” You say in your ear piece that rapped around your ear

“OH BABY, DID THIS LITTLE ANT GIVE YOU A HARD TIME.” Racheal says inside her ear piece that she also wore.

“Yea I’ve been afraid for my life, could you please deal with it baby?” You say with hope in your voice.

“OF COURSE ILL HANDLE IT BABY. WE WOULDN'T WANT YOU GETTING HURT NOW WOULD WE?” Racheal says with a little giggle that shakes your very soul.

“No we would not.” You reply.

The ground once again begins to shake as in the distance, you see Racheal’s foot rise 100s of feet in the air. The ant sensing what’s coming begins to run away in fear. You do nothing but watch it’s meager attempts to escape. You sky is soon becomes the color of skin as Racheals foot hovers above you.

“NOBODY, AND I MEAN NOBODY HURTS MY LITTLE MAN.” Racheal says as if she where threatening someone she really hated.

Racheal begins to lower her titanic big toe slowly. Racheals toe grew larger as it came closer to the ground. You where amazed by Racheals overwhelming might. This ant was absolutely nothing coma
Red to her, the same ant that had threatened your life a few moments ago.

“BOOM!”

As Racheals toe makes contact with the ground, the ground once again begins to shake. You being thrown 3 feet into the air land on the ground hard. The wind rages all around you as your ear ring from the powerful collision of Racheals toe. This was powerful.

As Racheals toe crushes the ant into the wooden floor you could hear the breaking of the ants exoskeleton. You could hear the sickening cracks of the ants 🐜 bones. The ants screams soon became silent as it was completely covered, completely obliterated by Racheals toe. Soon the whole room becomes quite.

“THERE YOU GO SWEETY, ITS ALL TAKEN CARE OF.” Racheal says from up above

“Yea thanks.” You say feeling a little shocked.

“SO LOVER BOY WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO TODAY?” Racheal asks.

“Uh????”
1523.title: Pest Control, the love of a savior

153.content:
Despite the security of your closet bedroom, it was easily penetrable for anyone with the key to the room in which the closet was. Past that, it was just a matter of the closet's door being slid open, something apparently easy to do as when you woke up you could see something large and threatening.

It was your family's dog, whose name was...
153.title: Your Family Dog

choices: Walk over to the exit beside Max
1531.content:
You never thought this could even happen, but against your expectations and this closet's trusted security, you could see, right in front of the few centimeters where you rested, a massive lump of fur you only know as your worst nightmare come to life.

Ever since you were little (young, I mean), you had faced many trials only worsened by your microscopic size. December had accidentally sat on you a few times, your mom nearly baked you into a cake before realising that you were trapped in a bag of sugar for several long, terrifying hours, and although more recent, Melly had caused you to have many paranoid thoughts of toy cars running you over and your tiny figure getting mixed in with all the other toys in her scarily filled-up toy basket.

Those weren't even the worst, however. When you were only 5, your older sister begged and begged for a pet. Your mother just wasn't having it though, until one dreadfully fateful Christmas Day when the family got a new puppy named Max. And worst of all, the dogbed was set up in the same room as your closet. This changed your highly peaceful nights alone and asleep into hours in bed where you either couldn't sleep because of Max's weirdly loud snoring or simply the fear that this beast could wake up and do goodness knows what to you with no one around to help.
With all your paranoia and an unfortunate incident, your mom decided to move him downstairs and ever since you never even wanted to think about this massive furball. Years passed, and he became a large monster of a pet, although probably not too big to anyone else.

Now, with all this backstory out of the way, the fact still stands that your family's dog found his way into your safe closet. You had no idea how, but when you thought about it the door of this room wasn't actually locked often and your closet had no locks whatsoever. The closet door behind the dog was left open, and Max himself was still fast asleep, blowing his breath right towards you. Max blocked you from getting out through the door. You saw a small opening behind him, but you, in your smaller world, were miles away from there. You also considered getting on him, as at least then you'd be somewhat out of danger on his back or something. But if you waited, you thought, he might go away or someone might come and find him.

What do you do next, puny one?
1531.title: Monster Dog, Max

choices: Overcome your fear and approach the beast!
1532.content:
Your family dog, named Jazzy by your older sister, sat right by where you sleep. You heard her panting, and the smell was, as with any dog, unbearable in your opinion.

It seemed unusual, considering your nature, that there even would be a dog in the family, but your older sister just couldn't be quiet about wanting a puppy really badly. It often seemed like she forgot about your presence when she went on and on about how adorable these slobbery, dangerous beasts are, but obviously to you just the word "dog" sends shivers down your spine.

Long story short, December got her wish and a small husky named Jazzy was introduced in the family, quick to grow up, get bigger and become even scarier to you over the years. Your mother wasn't at all happy with the dog though, and made sure to keep Jazzy far away from your fragile self.

Many years had been managed between you and this giant, but a few slip-ups, like you falling right into the dog bowl below the dining table, or your little sister playing with you and Jazzy at the same time with less than fun results, had occured and sent you into loathing this dog's very existence.

But now back to your problem, Jazzy as she sat by your small abode didn't seem to notice you were even there, as her eyes were looking elsewhere, unusual for dogs who in your experience seem to love small things. You saw this as a good thing, as the big mountain of fluff and terror didn't see you and you could easily walk away at any minute without her notice. You could also overcome your fears and walk up to her, or just stay where you are and see what happens.

What happens now?
1532.title: Jazzy

choices: You continue to put on the saddle and reins
Uh-oh, this mouse does not want you to put on the saddle and reins
155.content:
You spot some quick movement out of the corner of your eye. You turn. Nothing. Again. Other side. You turn. Again, nothing. Suddenly breathing...directly behind you!

You spin on your heels and come face to face with....a mouse?!

It just looks at you and you look at it. Both of you stare at each other for a long time. You examine the light gray colored mouse in this time. It's big, maybe large plant-eating dinosaur-sized compared to you. Actually on second thought, you guess that it has to be larger than that, you are about half the size of its eye. I mean its nose is the size of a tractor trailer compared to you!

As it looks at you, you think, "Maybe I can tame this thing and it could be some kind of pet/vehicle thing for me..." You ponder on this. It hasn't hurt you yet, but it IS a wild animal and a possibly dangerous one. You carefully walk up to it, ready for some kind of attack from it at any moment. You make it to its tractor trailer sized nose, which is close to the ground, and you start to pet it. The mouse makes some purring kind of noise which you take as a sign of pleasure and happiness. Maybe you could tame this mouse.

You stop petting it and start to walk towards your bed to get a pile of string that you always keep stockpiled - never know when you have to climb up or down something. The mouse follows closely behind you, each step causing loud booms. You grab your string and some fabric and make some kind saddle for the mouse. The mouse is so big though that you'll have to put the saddle on its head though. You also fashion some reins to control the mouse with. Now for the tricky part...putting it on the mouse.

You carefully approach the mouse and you pet it for a moment before you start to put on the reins.
155.title: Reader's Choice

choices: To go show somebody your new tamed pet mouse, away!
1551.content:
You carefully put the reins on the mouse and then you climb up the mouse, using the fur as handholds and you make it up to the top of the mouse's head where you put the saddle on and attach it to the reins. After setting it all up, you plop down into the saddle, taking the reins and shake them with a "Gidiup!"....and the mouse does absolutely nothing.

You try again this time though with a "Hi ho silver, away!" Again the mouse does nothing. You sigh, this is going to be harder than you thought. You've got to train this mouse....

Several hours later....

"Go!" you yell, shaking the reins. The mouse obeys and charges across the room, you pull on the right rein and the mouse goes right, you pull on the left rein and the mouse goes left. You yank on both reins simultaneously and the mouse comes to a halt. You grin, "Cool."

You now have your very own tamed mouse to use and care for, like a building sized horse. You have no idea whether your mom will let you even keep it though. Maybe you could just keep it a secret, but maybe you should inform her when you get a chance. The choice is yours to make...later when your mom comes around to you. What are you going to do now?
1551.title: Tamed mouse

15513.content:
"Go my mouse!!"You yelled,shaking the reins.The Monstrous Mouse obeyed,running out of the closet.You had decided to show somebody your newly found pet!A teenager 1/100th of an inch tall,taming a mouse one-hundred times his size is an incredible feat.

The Mouse takes you down the hall,to the front door.As if by instinct,he ignored your controls,and went through a mousehole,secretly hidden,to the outside.He stopped,you were back in control."Alright,who to show?"You mused to yourself,smiling.This was an adventure now!!You could go show your best friend,Andrew.He only lived across the street,and he was always amazed by the 'little' things.

Or,somebody else?A few others came to mind.
15513.title: Show somebody your new tamed mouse,Away!

155131.content:
If there was one person who would truly appreciate your new steed, it would be Andy.

"Hiyah!"

The mouse takes off across the street at top speed, arriving at Andy's house in no time. The journey was simple, but now you were faced with the issue of actually arriving at your destination, as there was no way you could see to get inside. Andy did use to have a self made door bell for you down on the corner of the door frame, but one of his normal sized friends hit it with the back of his heel one time, smashing it to bits a few days ago. So now you had to find a way inside. With a quick survey of the entrance area you find a tear in the mortar in the corner of the house that perhaps the mouse could chew through, allowing you to enter the walls of the house.

You could also try to get the mouse to climb the wall and reach the doorbell.
155131.title: Hi Ho to Andrew.... AWAY!!!

1551312.content:
You instruct the mouse to climb up the wall towards the doorbell. Once you arrive at the doorbell, you lean over the mouse and slam down it, causing the loud ring to go off inside the house. You direct the mouse back down onto the floor to await the massive door to be answered.

Eventually, the door opens to reveal...
1551312.title: Climb the wall

choices: The News!Even though their station is on the other side of town.......
155132.content: Well,there were two other choices.Your Girlfriend,Racheal!She loved you,and this would probably turn into a interesting date with the mouse added.Or,popularity.The Local News considered you a celebrity,and this could help your popularity status,maybe even skyrocket it!!You grinned.
155132.title: The Other Peoples

info.brief_description: Live out your life.....just really,really tiny.
info.description:
*Originally done by CinderAxis*

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1688935-Your-LifeSmaller-2
Sequal above

The day you were born,it was a miracle,a medical marvel.You were born 1/100th of an inch tall,near microscopic.The Doctor had to use a magnifying glass and a pair of the tiniest tweezers to remove you from your Mother.

Now,you are 14,and is still 1/100th of an inch tall.Live out your life,and try to stay alive.

Dying is a constant issue for your miniscule self.Your all Female Family members love you,but each one has proved a threat at your size.Neighbors,friends,enemies,teachers,fellow students,strangers,and even your girlfriend all have endangered your life at least one time.But,your philosophy is simple:

Live out each day to it's limit.

---------------
Characters:
---------------

Main Character
Name:Your Name
Age:14
Gender:Male
Appearance:A slim,and highly athletic teen with neck-length brown hair.1/100th of an inch tall though......

Mom
Name:Karen
Age:42
Gender:Female
Appearance:A mid-sized woman,with a beautiful face.She has flowing brown hair,and equally deep brown eyes.She wears dresses most of the time.Despite her age,Karen has managed to keep fit and healthy.
Personality:A loving and caring mother,she's always worried and cared for you at your size.She is a strong,loving woman.

Older Sister
Name:December
Age:18
Gender:Female
Appearance:Tall and slender.December takes after your dead father,and has blonde shoulder-length hair.She has the biggest chest your microscopic self has ever seen,her breasts being an H cup.She usually wears tight shirts(obvious reasons),and skirts.
Personality:You love your sister,but you have to admit,she's dumber than dumb.Putting a whole new level on 'Dumb Blonde'.

Baby Sister
Name:Melody 'Melly'
Age:3
Gender:Female
Appearance:Of course,kindergartender.She has an almost angelic face,which blue eyes and hazel hair.She usually wears tennis shoes and 'Hello Kitty' clothes.
Personality:Sweet and loving to the naked eye,but when no one of importance is looking,she's a complete spoiled brat.

Girlfriend
Name:Racheal
Age:14
Gender:Female
Appearance:Tall and slender,she has dyed black hair,with a delicate face which hides her true nature.She has C cups,but her best feature is her butt,not too big and not too small,and firm.Usually wears hoodies,tight jeans,and flip-flops.
Personality:She's very protective of you,and has a deep caring for those who need it.She can be ferocious when needed though....

Best Friend
Name:Andrew
Age:14
Gender:Male
Appearance:An athletic soccer pro.He has tanned skin,and a buzz cut.
Personality:A pretty self-centered guy.But,Andrew's been protecting your microscopic butt since the 2nd grade,so you two have a tight friendship.

Of course,there are others........

Rules:

1.Have Fun!
2.Mild Vore is allowed.....ONLY MILD!!
3.Nothing too crazy like instant weight gain,okay?
4.Death is allowed,just not too much.
5.Keep additions sizeable please.At least 3-5 sentences.
6.NO "Oh she stepped on you and now the end ha ha."
7.Characters can shrink or grow!!Just give a good reason for it.
8.The story can end,just have a good build-up.
9.Male interaction is allowed,just nothing gay or sexual.
10.Animal interaction is allowed!!Just no animal sex,gross.
11.No toilet stuff!!yet another GROSS!!

I reserve the right to add,take away rules.Enjoy^^
